title: President William Jefferson Clinton Birthplace Home National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons          The park is open daily from 9:00 a.m. - 4:30 p.m. and tours of the Clinton Birthplace Home are offered every 30 minutes. The park is closed Thanksgiving Day, December 25, and January 1. For more information, please contact us at 870-777-4455 or email us.
